701287f-a.title: Bronx: Hughes Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
701287f-a.text:
Hughes Ave., north from East Tremont Ave. Also shown is a general
view northeastward of the East Tremont section of the Bronx as seen from
the Bergen Building, st the S.E. corner of East Tremont and Arthur Aves.
May 1926.
Brown Brothers.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701287f-a.folder: Hughes Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700917f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Hughes Avenue
700917f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., east from Hughes Ave. Also shown is a general
view as seen from the Bergen Building, at the S.E. corner of Arthur Ave.
May 1926.
Brown Brothers.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
Neg E L-453
700917f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Hughes Avenue, Bronx, NY
